TopicTitle: Ksp Tips And Tricks For Beginners

Articles.Content:
Video contains information for beginners to help them along in their ksp adventures.. Also most of these tips apply to Mission Controller Extended a Mod I work on. It can be used to save money. And even save missions that might go wrong.

1. How to fly straight to Mun.
2. Minmus too?
3. Boosters useless?
4. No mono, you can still dock!
5. Editor Tips
6. Polar orbits and other Degree changes. Easy way at launch!
